import React, { Component } from "react"; import Modal from "../node_modules/react-modal"; //import ModalButton from "./modal-button"; class AddExpense extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { modalOpened: false }; this.toggleModal = this.toggleModal.bind(this); } toggleModal() { this.setState(prevState => ({ modalOpened: !prevState.modalOpened })); } render() { const { data } = this.props; return (
click to open modal {data.description}
); } } { /* class AddExpense extends Component { state = {}; render() { return (

With' you 'and all of: All of' CodingMart Fellas '
); } } */ } export default AddExpense;
